titleStmt.title: Musik til Hans Hartvig Seedorff Pedersens "Hyldest til Holberg"

work.title: Musik til Hans Hartvig Seedorff Pedersens "Hyldest til Holberg"
Music for Hans Hartvig Seedorff Pedersen's 'Homage to Holberg'

history.p: In 1922, The Royal Theatre was celebrating the playwright Ludvig Holberg. As a tribute to Holberg, the theatre had commissioned Hans Hartvig Seedorff Pedersen to write an epilogue. The conductor at the theatre, Georg Høeberg, urged Nielsen to compose the music for this homage to Holberg. Nielsen must have started working on the project immediately; less than three weeks later he had finished it.

incipText.p: Hvem har kaldt, os hid i Dag?
Nu løfter Holbergs Træ sit Løv

titleStmt.title: Vocal parts, print and manuscript copy

repository.corpName: DK-København, Det Kongelige Teaters Arkiv & Bibliotek
